entry.title: The Travel Yoga Mat
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 48.00

Description
Yoga, stretching, ab work or just a little Savasana - however you decide you want to move today this lightweight mat will get you through it. Designed to roll up and be toted around with it's own included strap or tucked into the straps of your favorite MOVES style. Namaste!
Specifications

Dims: 26"H x 70"W x 4mm
Materials: Thermoplastic Elastomer (TPE); Poly webbing strap.
Care: Spray with warm water & a few drops of dish soap or a 3:1 water to vinegar solution. Wipe clean with a damp towel or sponge. Do not leave out in the sun. Do not fold but roll for storage.

 
Details
Made of biodegradable TPE synthetic rubber
Roll up and secure with included strap for easy carry and storage
Engraved BEIS Logo
Light weight

How you can move with this product
Yoga, pilates, any work out that you need a little extra padding! Naps :)

entry.title: The Hanging Shower Caddy
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 34.00

Description

Getting clean never felt so ... clean. This shower caddy was designed to drain and dry so you can get on with your day after that intense (or not so) workout. The mesh material is quick drying and will ensure no pools of water collect. Just enough room for all your shower needs and a few extra necessities.
Specifications

Dims: 9.5"H x 4.5"W x 5"D
Materials: PVC
Care: Clean with warm water and soap, air dry

 
Details
DETAILS:
The you gym friendly shower caddy
Mesh material for easy draining and drying
Easy to hang over a shower head, on a hook or clipped over a towel bar
Front flap folds down to show interior
Mesh panel keeps products upright for easy storage and display
Elastic loops for a tooth brush and/or razor
Exterior side zip pocket

How you can move with this product
Cosmetics & toiletries
Shower caddy for gym and beyond
Travel

entry.title: The Sport Wristlet Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 34.00

Description
At first glance this little beauty might look like a cute wristlet, but she is SO much more. Each piece was designed so that you could carry them as a set or individually. The d-ring on each pouch can also be attached to the inside of any BÉIS bag, using our signature key fob (you can find this on interior seam of every BÉIS bag). Even better, the small snap card case comes with a scruchie, take it for a spin on it's own and never have a reason you can't pull your hair back!

 
Specifications

Dims: CREDIT CARD HOLDER: 2.625"H x 3.875"W
ROUND ZIP POUCH: 3.5"W X 3.5"H
RECTANGLE ZIP POUCH: 4.25"H X 7.5"W
Materials: CREDIT CARD HOLDER: Exterior - PU, Interior - Recycled Poly
ROUND AND RECTANGLE POUCHES: Exterior - Wrinkle Nylon, Interior - Recycled Poly
STRAP: Macrame Nylon Paracord
Care: Spot Clean, Lay Flat to Dry

 
Details
DETAILS:
The perfect set of accessories to keep all your gym (and beyond) needs organized
3 different pouches:
1 round zip pouch with an interior elasticized slip pocket - perfect for airpods, earbuds, hair accessories, jewelry
1 long zip pouch - perfect for cash, a few makeup items
1 snap envelope pouch perfect for cards - includes a removable scrunchie that can be used to slip the pouch on your wrist or throwing your hair in a pony
Multiple ways to carry
Carry all three together or individually with the provided braided paracord wristlet strap
D-rings on each style so you can easily clip into any BEIS bag’s included key leash
The envelope pouch can slip onto wrist alone using removable scrunchie
How you can move with this product
On-the-go - hike, bike, walk, run, skip, jump, skate
The perfect necessities only gym companion

entry.title: Stroller Straps
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: Diaper Bag
Price: 18.00

Description
Pretty simple - turn any bag - with d-rings that you would normally strap a removable strap to - and turn it into a diaper bag. All you need is our Tote Insert and these Stroller Straps and you've pretty much just made your own innovative mom (or dad) on the go bag!
Specifications
Dims: 10" Loop
Materials: Poly Webbing with silicone grip
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 0.25lbs

 
Details
EXTERIOR
- logo straps with snap hooks to wrap around stroller handles and connect any diaper bag with d-rings
- silicone grip on poly webbing prevents slippage
PERFECT FOR
-Baby Needs
-Travel
-Work Tote
-Carry-on

entry.title: E-Gift Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rise.ai
Type:
Price: 25.00 - 500.00 (7 variants)

Shopping for someone else but not sure what to give them? Give them the gift of choice with a gift card.
Gift cards are delivered by email and contain instructions to redeem them at checkout. Our gift cards have no additional processing fees.

entry.title: The Changing Organizer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: Diaper Bag
Price: 38.00

Description

When you are always on-the-go - even within your own home - a portable changing pad is a must have! Roomy enough to go from newborn to toddler, padded to provide a protective and comfortable landing space for your little one and folds up to a compact accessory that can go from nursery, to living room, to car, to changing room, anywhere, because we know THAT is not on a schedule!
Specifications

Dims: 21" W x 35" L x 0.5" H
Body: Nylon Twill, Trim: Buffalo PU, Poly Mesh, Lining: 100% Poly
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 2lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
- larger, portable changing pad
- folds up into easy to grab and go
- wristlet strap with snap for easy carry or to loop around a bag or stroller handle
INTERIOR
- mesh pocket for diapers
- zip pocket for wipes
PERFECT FOR
-Baby Needs
-Travel

entry.title: The On The Go Essential Case in Sakura Pink
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 48.00

Description

Stop the pre-flight dig with our two-faced travel companion. Designed to keep your beauty essentials organized from take-off to touch-down with an easy-to-carry handle and a mini-mirror. Tackle your travel beauty routine effortlessly.
Specifications
Dims: 7.5"W X 3.5"H x 5.25"D
Materials:
Body: PU, PVC
Lining: Poly
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 0.56lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
- faux leather fabrication
- gold foil stamped 'let's go" & "we're here" label for compartments
- double sided cosmetic case to separate your take-off and touch-down needs (and beyond)
- single U-zip wide opening/closure for easy access to beauty essentials
- clear windows to help you see what's inside
INTERIOR
- slip pocket with mini removable mirror
PERFECT FOR:
-Cosmetics
-Skin Care (face cream, sprays)
-Toiletries
-Eye Mask
-Face Mask
-Lip Gloss
-Hot Mess Wipes
-Hand Sanitizer
-toothpaste & toothbrush

entry.title: The Lingerie Packing Cube Set in Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 48.00

Description

No one wants to be that person whose luggage comes off the carousel with that lone pair of underwear peaking out. This set of packing cubes was designed to prevent that exact type of embarrassment well that and to keep your delicates safely tucked away and easily accessible upon arrival. This 5 piece set was designed to keep your bra cups intact, your dirty and clean underwear separated and the washing of these items when you arrive back home less of a chore.
Shay's Inspo

"Whether you like grannies or something a little lighter in coverage, this set will not only keep you organized while on the go, it also keeps the clean pieces away from the dirty. Light on the unmentionables? These cubes easily double in purpose for other travel essentials." - Shay
Details

5-PIECE SET
Keep your delicates organized
WASH BAG
Easy to unpack & launder 
TO WASH, TO WEAR
Keep dirty & clean items in their place
UNMENTIONABLES
Keep those (wink-wink) items tucked away!
DIMENSIONS
12 x 4 x 9.5

entry.title: The Hanging Jewelry Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 48.00

Description

Every practical packing person needs a place to organize their jewelry. This organized packing essential keeps necklaces untangled, smaller, delicate jewelry in view and protected and has enough space for your favorite chunky, statement pieces. Lined with a peach skin microfiber that is gentle enough for your fine jewelry and clear windows to ensure you will never loose even the tiniest stud. Folds neatly into your luggage and hangs from a closet or towel bar for displaying and ease of accessorizing on-the-go.
Specifications

Dims: 24"H x 12"W (unfolded)
7"H x 12"W (folded)
Materials: Body - PU, TPU, Trim - nylon coil zippers, Lining - Microsuede
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 0.94lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
- oversized Béis logo
- adjustable hidden magnetic closure
INTERIOR
- 6 small zip pockets
- 3 necklace holders
- 1 elasticized pocket
- 2 medium zip pockets
- 1 large zip pocket
- embossed Béis logo
- built-in hanger
PERFECT FOR
-Jewelry
-Travel
-Organization
-Toiletries
-Make-Up

entry.title: The Stroller Caddy
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 34.00

Description

Designed for moms on-the-go, keeping the babe's and your needs at your finger-tips from park to plane! The Stroller Caddy features adjustable straps that snap around the handle of your stroller, a shopping cart, or around the metal brackets of a plane's seatback tray. A removable, adjustable shoulder strap on this stroller caddy makes it easy to take with you and all the pockets include a mesh dump-all compartment, because we know sometimes you gotta make a quick exit! Bonus Feature: we hid tabs in The Diaper Bag that the caddy can easily snap into for a little extra organization!
Specifications

Dims: L: 19", W: 1". H: 14"
Materials: Nylon Twill, Brushed Ice Gold Hardware, Poly Lining, Poly Mesh
Water resistant protective finish
Care: Spot Clean, Dry Flat
Weight: .5lbs
Details

 

EXTERIOR
- 2 bottle pockets with elasticized opening
- 2 zip compartments
- 1 zip pocket
- 1 slip pocket
- adjustable removable shoulder strap strap - for taking with you
- 2 adjustable straps to hook over your stroller or into The Diaper Bag
- Large mesh compartment for loose things with snaps up to become compact
- 2 elastic loops

entry.title: The Bottle Cooler
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 28.00

Description

You're getting cooler! We designed this must-have baby accessory to keep your babe's bottles at just the right temp, perfect for moms on the go. Ice packs are included with this baby bottle bag to keep things cool until you need to warm them to the babe's liking. This insulated baby bottle bag keeps bottles cool or warm for several hours. A small zip pocket for bottle accessories and an ID window ensures no one steals the babe’s lunch!
Specifications

Dims: L: 6.75", W: 3.75", H: 13"
Materials: Nylon Twill, Brushed Ice Gold Hardware, Water resistant zippers, Water resistant protective finish
Care: Spot Clean, Dry Flat
Weight: 1.08lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
- zip pocket for small items
- ID window with ID cards to personalize
- Removable strap that can snap over stroller bar for handsfree toteing
- Large BEIS logo
INTERIOR
- Insulated to keep things cool or warm for several hours (up to .... hours)
- Ice pack included
PERFECT FOR
- Baby Needs
- Snacks
- Travel

entry.title: The 29" Large Luggage Cover
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 44.00

Description
Travel isn’t always glamorous, with all the miles, we are bound to pick a few extra bumps & bruises. Our luggage can sometimes feel the brunt of it, whether it’s encountered an overzealous luggage handler or caught out in the elements. The Large Luggage Cover, made to fit our 29" Large Check-In Roller, was designed to give your prized piece a little extra protection, for whatever Travel Gods throw at you!
Specifications

Dims: 18.5" W x 12.5" D x 29" H
Materials: PVC, Polyester, Nylon zipper, Hardware, TPU
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 2.4
Details
EXTERIOR

fits the 29" BEIS rolling luggage
expands an to fit luggage when it expands
zips on for a tight fit
cutouts to ensure use

PERFECT FOR
Travel
Luggage Storage
Protecting your luggage

entry.title: The Flat Iron Cover
entry.summary:
Vendor: Beach House Group
Type: Luggage Accessories
Price: 28.00

Description

Picture this, you're finishing straightening your hair when you realize your flight leaves in less than two hours. You obviously can't leave that flat iron behind. So, what do you do? Wrap it in a towel and risk your precious cargo going up in flames?! No-way! Alas, meet the Flat Iron Cover. Tuck that hot tool, still piping hot, into the The Flat Iron Cover and worry no more. Last minute touch-ups, yes! Burned blouses, no!
Specifications
Dims: 12.5"H x 4.5"W x 1"D
Materials:
Exterior - Poly Canvas
Lining - heat resistant liner
Trim - PU edge binding
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 0.26lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
- poly with patent trim
- fire retardant lining
- exterior pocket to keep cord untangled
- embossed BÉIS logo patch
- hidden mag closure

PERFECT FOR
Travel
At home Storage

entry.title: The Seatback Organizer in Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Beach House Group
Type: Luggage Accessories
Price: 24.00

Description

Ever put your hand in the seat back pocket of a plane and come out with a mysterious sticky finger?! Not anymore! Our seatback pocket was designed to keep your travel essentials AND your hands free from the mystery of the seat back pocket! A couple slip pockets for smaller items, a long zip pocket in back for important travel documents and hidden magnets that 'lock' it in place. When you’re done, just fold it up and pack away. Bon voyage, germs!

 
Specifications

Dims: 5.5"H x 12.5"W
Materials:
Body - PU,
Trim- PVC, nylon zippers
Lining - Polyester
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 1lb
Details

EXTERIOR
- easy to clean faux leather (PVC) material
- embossed BÉIS logo
INTERIOR
- hidden magnetic closure - to secure close or secure around seat-back pocket
- one long slip pocket (magazine, tablet, book)
- 3 small slip pockets (fits up to 3.5" cellphone, ear buds, tissues, antibacterial wipes, chapstick, glasses, sunnies, boarding pass, contact case, pens, passport
- long clear PVC zip pocket (boarding pass, passport, customs forms, skin care, eye mask, ear plugs, socks)
PERFECT FOR
Keeping travel essentials organized and at your ﬁngertips - no more hands in the germy seat back pocket

entry.title: The Passport & Luggage Tag Set in Black Patent
entry.summary:
Vendor: Beach House Group
Type: Luggage Accessories
Price: 23.80

Description

What you need when you're on the go, full stop. A Passport Holder that acts as a mini wallet, a luggage tag to stylishly mark your territory, and a bonus clear pouch for all your last minute essentials and liquids. Feel like the most experienced traveler, even if it's your first flight!

 
Shay's Inspo

"This is an essential trio for any serious traveler. I wanted to have something to identify your precious luggage, and to protect one of our most important possessions - our passports - while traveling. The clear bag is perfect for tossing mini-bottles in to the weekender for easy grabbing at security." - Shay 
Details

4-PIECE SET
Ready, set, go.
CLEAR POUCH
3-1-1, here we come!
PEN HOLDER + PEN
No more asking your neighbor.
CARD HOLDER
Keep it together—just don’t lose it.
GOLD LOGO
Baggage claim meets a bit of bling.
